notes: Disclaimer: In the event of a discrepancy between this course sequence and the official calendars, the calendars take precedence and are considered the authoritative source.
NSG 5140 and/or NSG 5192 can be taken during the winter or spring summer term.
Subject to approval from the program director, appropriate electives may be chosen from other graduate programs offered at the University of Ottawa or at other universities.
The three elective courses NSG (9 units) can be completed at any term (1st or 2nd year).
Students must enroll in each term until they complete their program.
Minimum Standards: The passing grade in all courses in the program is B (70%). Students who fail two courses or six units must withdraw.

courses: NSG5130 | Development of knowledge and theory in nursing as a discipline
NSG5215 | Advanced Nursing Practice in Health Care
NSG5216 | Practicum: Advanced Nursing Practice in Health Care
Elective | Three elective courses in NSG (9 units)
NSG6401 | Clinical project in advanced nursing practice
NSG6401 | Clinical project in advanced nursing practice
